head.title: Rearrange {{FileFormatUp}} pages in {{EnvName}}
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to effortlessly change the order of pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Process PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and more.

header.title: Rearrange pages in {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} provides {{EnvNameShort}} applications with the ability to easily change the order of pages in {{FileFormatUp}} documents.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: About {{ProdShortName}}
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a robust document processing tool supporting over 50 file formats, including PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, images, and archives. It offers powerful features for merging, splitting, extracting, rearranging, swapping, and deleting pages.

more_features.title: Comprehensive document handling
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} delivers a rich set of features, allowing you to work with over 50 popular business file formats efficiently.

feature_1.title: Merge documents of different types
feature_1.content: Combine content from PDFs, Word files, presentations, spreadsheets, images, and archives. Use flexible options to customize the final document structure.

feature_2.title: Modify document pages
feature_2.content: Rearrange pages in your documents by moving, swapping, or removing them as needed.

feature_3.title: Adjust page layout and orientation
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to any desired angle or switch between portrait and landscape modes.

feature_4.title: Extract pages as separate documents
feature_4.content: Select specific pages and save them as standalone files for further use.

formats.title: Rearrange pages in multiple formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} supports over 50 file formats, offering flexibility and precision in document manipulation.

operations.title: Core features
operations.description: Discover other essential features included in our solution.

examples.comment_1: Initialize a {{NameProduct}} instance with the source document
examples.comment_2: Define the page number that needs to be moved

content.title: [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) simplifies the process of moving pages within {{FileFormatUp}} documents. Enhance your {{EnvName}} applications with advanced document organization capabilities.
content.step_1: Specify the path to the {{FileFormatUp}} document.
content.step_2: Indicate the page number and its new position.

code_1.title: Move a page to the last position in a document
code_1.content: This example demonstrates how to relocate a page to the end of a {{FileFormatUp}} document.
code_1.comment_2: Retrieve document details and determine the last page number
code_1.comment_3: Configure the move operation with the target page numbers
code_1.comment_5: Save the updated document in the desired location
